statements: SELECT * FROM patient_history;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_history WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, treatment, outcome FROM patient_history WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_history WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_history ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_history
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_history WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patient_history WHERE outcome = 'recovered'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment FROM patient_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND age < 30
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_history WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 60
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE result_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, treatment_details FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, city FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender, city FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM patients WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender, city FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC, city ASC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_outcome FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT diagnosis_description FROM diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, primary_doctor FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, primary_doctor FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' OR gender = 'F';
SELECT DISTINCT treatment_type FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_type ASC;
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_type, t.treatment_date, t.treatment_outcome FROM patients p INNER JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id ORDER BY t.treatment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.diagnosis_id, p.patient_name, d.diagnosis_date, d.diagnosis_description FROM patients p INNER JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id ORDER BY d.diagnosis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.date_of_visit, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id INNER JOIN Treatments ON MedicalRecords.treatment = Treatments.treatment_name WHERE Patients.gender = 'Male';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.date_of_visit, ResearchStudies.study_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id INNER JOIN StudyParticipants ON Patients.patient_id = StudyParticipants.patient_id INNER JOIN ResearchStudies ON StudyParticipants.study_id = ResearchStudies.study_id WHERE Patients.patient_id = 2;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.date_of_visit, Treatments.treatment_name, Treatments.duration, Treatments.cost FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id INNER JOIN Treatments ON MedicalRecords.treatment = Treatments.treatment_name WHERE Patients.date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
